name: 08 - Archive a team
precondition: A active team to archive should already exist.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description: Run `./mattermost team archive ateam`
inline.expectedResult:
`./mattermost team list` should show `ateam (archived)` 
After no. 1:
  • Refresh the app page
  • "Team not available" message on the main page
  • Click "Back to <MM server>"
  • Team is no longer listed in team sidebar
  • Team is still listed in drop-down in System Console Team Statistics
  • Team is not listed in teams available to join (moot if it had been closed)

inline.description:
On RN:
  1. Log out and back in.
inline.expectedResult:
• Team is no longer listed in team sidebar
  • Team is not listed in teams available to join (moot if it had been closed)
